mapper.select: select brand_id id, brand_name `name`, first_pinyin from risk_car_brand order by first_pinyin ASC
select series_id id, series_name `name` from risk_car_series where brand_id=#{brandId} order by `name` ASC
select model_id id, model_name `name` from risk_car_model where series_id=#{seriesId} order by `name` ASC
